TopicTitle: Baumgartner must be now really rally pissed off :-)

It's great that he's well fed and safe.

Moving right along... This is decadence at its worst.

Edited October 25, 2014 by Cpt. Kipard
I don't think so, he probably did it for the money and the fame and he got both of them already.

Seeing that Eustace made practically zero publicity around this jump, as compared to Baumgartner's jump, I wouldn't accuse him of doing it for fame. He is already pretty famous as VP of Google, so he doesn't really have anything to prove on that front.
That's a lot of money going to a company involved in high-altitude and space development. I'm all for that. Thanks, Mr. Eustace!

Seeing that Eustace made practically zero publicity around this jump, as compared to Baumgartner's jump, I wouldn't accuse him of doing it for fame. He is already pretty famous as VP of Google, so he doesn't really have anything to prove on that front.

Baumgartner was sponsored so they wanted more publicity, Eustace paid it himself so it was no need to make it know until after he broke the record.

Main difference is that Baumgartner sat in a pod during accent and could probably landing in it if anything went wrong. Eustace had the balloon connected to the parachute harness. Yes It was some other gear on the accent part too, probably air and power used during accent.

This is decadence at its worst.

Really? A high-altitude jump is decadence at its worst? Really? Its worst?

Really? A high-altitude jump is decadence at its worst? Really? Its worst?

I don't like Baumgartner. He has proven to be a cocky douchebag when he was, as a famous person on the peak of his popularity, taking a dump on the effort of going to Mars. He's not really into space exploration, and is an adrenalin addict. The media romanticized him.

Can you not read?

and he spent his own money and his suit and chute were MUCH more advanced than Baumgartner's. While The Google Exec does not NEED the fame, he did not publicize because he was spending his OWN money.

Also the talk about decadence should STOP NOW. this is not the right place to discuss that topic. This is the Science Lab where science and technology should be discussed not the relative decadence of things. If the decadence talk continues the thread will be locked.
